sections.heading: of policy.It is the policy of this state to ensure that all subscribers are protected from the unauthorized switching of a telecommunications company selected by the subscriber to provide telecommunications service

sections.text:
86-202.Statement of policy.

It is the policy of this state to ensure that all subscribers are protected from the unauthorized switching of a telecommunications company selected by the subscriber to provide telecommunications service.

SourceLaws 1999, LB 150, § 2;R.S.1943, (1999), § 86-1902;Laws 2002, LB 1105, § 64.
